overview: Simon of the tribe of Bopope, and the dancers of the troupe Tyaou rehearse a very ancient dance. An old man of the Tyaou clan allowed Simon to dance it and even to modernize it. To make their outfits and make-up, they go to the forest to look for borao bark and wobble tree seeds.
title: Niè ocèmwo, bè-me ali-hî mèé
